cast.overview: With the price on his head ever increasing, John Wick uncovers a path to defeating The High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy with powerful alliances across the globe and forces that turn old friends into foes.
cast.title: John Wick: Chapter 4

details.biography: Marie-Pierra Kakoma (French pronunciation: [maʁi pjɛʁa kakɔma]; born May 27, 1996), known professionally as Lous and the Yakuza, is a Congolese-Belgian singer, rapper, songwriter, model, and artist. She rose to prominence after the release of her debut single "Dilemme" in September 2019, which was followed by "Tout est gore" in December 2019 and "Solo" in March 2020. Her debut album, Gore, produced by el Guincho, was released on 16 October 2020.
details.name: Lous and the Yakuza
details.place_of_birth: Lubumbashi, Democratic Republic of the Congo
